root.name: Adam's Venture: Episode One - The Search for the Black Garden
root.description: StoryAdam's Venture is an action exploration game. Set during the 1920’s, Adam’s Venture delivers a combination of action oriented gameplay with classic puzzle solving. It takes you on a journey to the middle East to discover the legendary Lost Garden of Eden. However, it is not so easy as it sounds as evil awaits you.This is the first episode of a series about the adventurer Adam Venture (what's in a name...) who uncovers scripts written long ago by a crusader who fought in the holy lands. The writings tell about a place with labyrinths and caves and great rivers. It also makes a reference to the Garden of Eden. Adam ventures out to find out!PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0 GHz or equivalent AMDMemory: 512 MBHard Disk Space: 1 GBVideo Card: Pixel Shader 3.0 Card requiredDirectX®: 9.0c
